name: Hero Alpha 0.6 (DEMO)
description:
Hello everybody this is my game Hero, a 2D platformer about a boy who goes on a journey to save his planet, Harquene. This is the FIRST ever game project I have completed. That being said I hope you find enjoyable and don't encounter too many issues while playing the three levels I designed. Also, it would be greatly appreciated for you to leave a comment and tell me your thoughts on this project.

-Indie Dev Dylan.

CONTROLLS:

[ I HIGHLY recommend leaving the shift key pressed in order to always have running active ]

A/D -  To move Left and Right

W - Climb Up

S - Climb Down or Crawl

SPACE - Jump/Swim

SHIFT - Run

ESCAPE - Pause

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Aim

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Shoot
